views.markdown: YouTube usually implements a feature as an experiment. You may get to see it while others don't, and vice-versa. This tweak adds a new section named "A/B" in the app settings where all features can be toggled freely by you. There are thousands of features available. Some of them are already overridden by tweaks like YTABGoodies and its predecessors.

- Added "Remove removed settings" inside the modified settings page to remove settings that are no longer available in the app
- Added "(Removed)" suffix to settings under the modified settings page that are no longer available in the app

- Improved performance throughout the tweak
- Made "View modified settings" option navigate to a new page where flags can be toggled instead of just showing an alert
- Removed kidsClient* and musicOfflineClient* A/B flags as they are unrelated to YouTube app

- Translated the remaining languages using AI
- Added th localization
- Made tweak settings displayed without YouGroupSettings tweak
- Added YouGroupSettings tweak as a dependency

- Updated setting icon
- Added id localization

- Reduced hooks used for constructing tweak settings
- Updated vi localization

- Fixed crash when copying settings on YouTube version 19.13.1 and higher
- Updated tr localization

- Fixed killswitch and grouped settings toggles not respecting the user's cancel action
- Refactored the code
- Updated es, ro and vi localization

- Changed the format of exported current settings to be prefixed with YT(Cold|Hot|Global)Config.
- The imported settings that have the same value as the current one will not be imported
- You can now import the YTABConfig settings from the clipboard
